title: Uppercase forums are back
content:
Shhh. Don't tell anybody.

[http://www.typophile.com/uppercase](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064902/http:/www.typophile.com/uppercase "http://www.typophile.com/uppercase")

Look for a formal announcement soon where we'll announce that all the past threads have been restored.
author: Joe Pemberton
